name: Cemetery Defence
description:
The dead have returned to life, which means that your base is under attack.
Fight the onslaught of a horde of skeletons by defending your base. Build various attacking towers and strengthen the wall. Don't let the main line of defense break through.

Cemetery Defense is a tower defense game. Your task is to prevent the destruction of the barrier wall by installing towers and improving them for greater combat effectiveness. The number of enemy forces will only grow, but the tactical advantage will be upgrades to your towers and walls.

Game Features:
- Low poly graphics
- Real-time tactics
- High difficulty
